ygData.subject: Re: New Spells Info
ygData.msgSnippet: Were these druids referring to out level 39 root upgrade Immobolize ?  I hear that this one is definately the best of the root series.  And btw, I just read
ygData.messageBody:
Were these druids referring to out level 39 root upgrade "Immobolize"? I
hear that this one is definately the best of the root series. And btw, I
just read an email from GZ, the druid roots are resisted EXACTLY as much as
all other roots in the game...

And I don't really feel bad about Bonds of Force, I'm definately not pissed
about it since it was an extra I didn't expect but I am disappointed with
its functionality. If and when you test it against a druid's ensnare you'll
know what I mean.

Euros Arcane
Rallos Zek


From: mstokes <mstokes@...>

>

Don't feel to bad about ensnare. I just got finished "discussing" root and
ensnare with a couple of high level druids on a message board. Basically
they
wanted a reliable root spell like wizards instead of their ensnare line. I
guess its true, The grass is always greener on the other side.
